item.title: AWS Automated Remediation - Part 2: S3 Buckets
item.description: Prelude Hey! Welcome back! This is the second iteration in our path to secure our AWS environments. Today we’re going to take a look at S3 buckets. You’ve all seen the news, S3 bucket made public, company X has leaked secrets about x,y, or z. Just some examples: oh look oh, another? wait?!, Theres more!!?!?! What if we could stop these when they happen! Not after the information gets leaked.
